display_long_description:
**The Thrill of the Fight 2 is available now in Early Access! We're looking forward to your feedback as we continue to add to the game. Currently only online multiplayer is available; offline single player is planned for 2025. Some game features are yet to be added and you may encounter bugs. Follow our development roadmap at thethrillofthefight2.com**


The fully reimagined sequel to the greatest VR boxing game ever made is now available. Glove up your fully personalizable avatar and test your skill while working up a sweat in the new online player versus player mode. Challenge friends or enter the ring through skill-based matchmaking as you battle through breathtaking arenas.

**Available now:**

**Immersive Online Multiplayer**: Skill-based matchmaking and direct matches with friends.

**Exceptionally High-Fidelity Boxing Experience**: Authentic, life-like physics for the world’s most realistic boxing simulation.

**Stunning Graphics and Realistic Immersion**: Breathtaking visuals and audio make you feel like you’re truly in the action.

**Represent Yourself in the Ring**: Personalize your character's facial features, gender, skin tone, and body type.

**Customize Your Gear**: Select your gloves, shorts, shoes, and more including premium gear coming later.

**Spectator App**: Gather your friends to watch your matches with a "live sports" style camera on a connected PC.

Join your fellow fans on our Discord: discord.gg/TheThrillOfTheFight2
